Desc.eng: Van Helsing, there is trouble brewing in the prison!
The inmates are revolting to hear more of your poems?
Not quite. Crime is running rampart in the city and some families decided to take shelter in our cells.
Ordinary citizens locking themselves up to be safe?
Yes. But a Kingpin has shown up and started demanding "rent" from the tenants.
So a criminal is extorting money from families taking refuge in our prison cells?
I'll have a word with this Kingpin!
We have more important matters at hand.
